participant_1.name: Luca
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, always eager to share knowledge and experiences.
participant_1.background: I am a cat owner. I speak fluent italian. My mom is an osteopath. I have one blue eye and one hazel eye. My brother is an archaeologist.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and creative, with a love for storytelling and baking.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is blue. I work at a grocery store. I like to read. I like cupcakes. I have brown hair.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
I'm Italian, do you know Italian?
I know a little bit, but not much.
That's okay! I know a little bit of English too, but not much.
That's good! We can practice together.
Yes, we can! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, bake, and play games.
Me too! I like to read, bake, and play video games.
That's great! We can bake some cupcakes together.
Yes, we can! I love cupcakes!
Me too! They're so delicious.
What's your favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I like to read a lot of different genres.
Me too! I like to read books about history, science, and romance.
I like to read books about history, fantasy, and mystery.
That's great! We can recommend books to each other.
Yes, we can! I love book recommendations.
What's your favorite game?
I like to play board games, video games, and card games.
Me too! I like to play board games like Catan and Monopoly, video games like Mario Kart and Call of Duty, and card games like Magic the Gathering and UNO.
I like to play board games like Monopoly, Scrabble, and Clue, video games like Mario Kart and Zelda, and card games like Magic the Gathering and Yu-Gi-Oh.
That's great! We can play games together.
Yes, we can! I love playing games.
